scripts.build:assets: copyfiles -e assets/favicon.ico assets/* assets/syntax/* public && copyfiles -u 1 assets/favicon.ico public
scripts.build:minifycss: minify assets/advanced.css > public/assets/advanced.css && minify assets/basic.css > public/assets/basic.css
scripts.build:minifyjs: minify assets/ctm.js > public/assets/ctm.js && minify assets/codepen.js > public/assets/codepen.js
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:assets && npm run build:html
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:server
